item.title: Crossctf 2018 Writeup
item.description: QuirkyScript 1 Problem var flag = require("./flag.js"); var express = require('express') var app = express() app.get('/flag', function (req, res) { if (req.query.first) { if (req.query.first.length == 8 && req.query.first == ",,,,,,," ) { res.send(flag.flag); return; } } res.send("Try to solve this."); }); app.listen(31337) Solution According to the express.js docs, req.query.* can be an array. Also, the code used == instead of ===; therefore, values of different types can be equal to each other and types are converted according to this:
